00045   return $this->result !== false;

00054  public function CMOracleQuery($result, $a = array()) {
00055   $this->result = $result;
00056   $this->a = $a;
00057  }
00058  
00091  public function fetch($rowMode = 'assoc', $formatter = false) {
00092   if(isset($this->a['formatter']) && $formatter === false)
00093    $formatter = $this->a['formatter'];
00094    
00095   if(!$this->result)
00096    return false;
00097   
00098   if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00099    $r = oci_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00100   elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00101    $r = oci_fetch_row($this->result);
00102   elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00103    $r = oci_fetch_row($this->result);
00104    $r = array($r[0], $r[1]);
00105   } elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00106    $r = oci_fetch_row($this->result);
00107    $r = $r[0];
00108   } else $r = false;
00109   
00110   // apply formatter
00111   if($formatter !== false)
00112    $r = $formatter->format($r);
00113   
00114   return $r;
00115  }
00116  
00125  public function fetchAll($rowMode = 'assoc', $direction = 'horizontal', $formatter = false) {
00126   if(!$this->result)
00127    return false;
00128   $r = array();
00129   
00130   if($direction == 'single')
00131    return $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter);
00132   
00133   while($row = $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter)) {
00134    if($direction == 'horizontal')
00135     $r[] = $row;
00136    elseif($direction == 'vertical') {
00137     if(is_array($row)) {
00138      foreach($row as $k => $v)
00139       $r[] = $v;
00140     } else $r[] = $row;
00141    } else return false;
00142   }
00143   
00144   return $r;
00145  }
